name: Superhit
description: A comprehensive compilation of some of the best and most popular songs composed by renowned artists is played back to back.

name: N 1 Songs
description: A compilation of some of the most popular songs that have become instant hits due to their melodious tunes and soulful lyrics.

name: Khotal Khatal
description: Special report.

name: Dil Se
description: An entertainment-based programme.

name: PYL Show
description: The host, Pasang Yonzon Lama, invites various famous people from the Nepalese entertainment industry and talks about their personal and professional lives.

name: Beauty And Fitness
description: The hosts talk about beauty and fitness regimens and present makeup styles for different occasions and various exercise routines.

name: Celebrity Interview
description: The host interacts with prominent celebrities and gets them to share interesting stories from their personal and professional lives.

name: Road Show
description: The hosts interact with people on the streets of Nepal and request them to share their views on various topics. They also present music videos performed by talented artists and interview celebrities.

name: Filmi 7
description: Entertainment-based programme.

name: Mahak Bhajan
description: Religious leaders, along with devotees, chant several bhajans that focus on the life and teachings of Hindu gods and goddesses.

name: Sant Rampal
description: A program that features a spiritual discourse delivered by Sant Rampal of Satlok Ashram.

name: Satpal Maharaj
description: Religious leader Satpal delivers a discourse to devotees and inspires them to follow the path of righteousness for leading a peaceful life.

name: Nepali Bulletin
description: The host presents the latest political and socio-economic news, updates and developments taking place in and around Nepal.

name: Varanasi Bulletin
description: The host presents the latest political and socio-economic news, updates and developments taking place in Varanasi.

name: Bhajan Ganga
description: Devotional programme.

name: North East Bulletin
description: The host presents a detailed report on some of the most important news stories and updates from the North Eastern part of the country.

name: Noida Fresh Bulletin
description: The host collates and presents the latest news updates and developments pertaining to politics, economics and current affairs of Noida.

name: Desh Ki Baat
description: Reputed personalities from various fields analyse and discuss social and political issues.

name: Special
description: The host presents a detailed discussion and analysis on the latest and the most important political or socio-economic news update of the day.

name: UK Bulletin
description: The host presents some of the latest social, political and economic news updates and developments from the country and other parts of the world.

name: Gadhwali Bulletin
description: The host presents the latest news stories, major developments and important updates that concern people from different walks of life.

name: UP Ki Baat
description: Take a look at the latest political news stories and updates from Uttar Pradesh.

name: Navrang
description: Special Report.

name: Music
description: A soulful and robust collection of songs composed and recorded by prolific musicians, singers and artists, played back to back.

name: State Live
description: The most recent news, updates and developments.

name: Super fast Live
description: The host presents the latest political and socio-economic news, updates and developments in the country in quick succession, live.

name: Dehradun Special
description: The host presents the latest political and socio-economic news, updates and developments taking place in Dehradun.

name: Sanyasi Ayurveda
description: A spiritual expert talks about the wide variety of herbal treatments that are available to treat various physical ailments.

name: UK Live
description: The host presents a round-up of some of the latest and important news stories and updates taking place all over the country, live.

name: Kumauni Bulletin
description: A reporter shares the latest news stories, updates and developments on current events and socio-political affairs in North and Northeast India.

name: Mudda
description: A panel of experts debates over the latest and significant socio-economic and political developments taking place in the country.

name: Uttrakhand Bulletin
